info.name: CAA Record
author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 59400
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;reflexqvt.anact.fr.	IN	 CAA
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 59400
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;reflexqvt.anact.fr.	IN	 CAA

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
anact.fr.	300	IN	SOA	dns1.namebay.com. admin.validname.com. 2023121317 10800 600 1209600 3600

info.name: HttpOnly Cookie - Detect
author: mr. bobo hp
info.description: Checks whether cookies in the HTTP response contain the HttpOnly attribute. If the HttpOnly flag is set, it means that the cookie is HTTP-only

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: reflexqvt.anact.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response: HTTP/1.1 302 Found Connection: close Transfer-Encoding: chunked Cache-Control: no-cache, private Content-Security-Policy: default-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; img-src * data:; Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8 Date: Sun, 24 Dec 2023 01:39:30 GMT Feature-Policy: midi 'none'; Location: /fr/ Referrer-Policy: origin-when-cross-origin Server: nginx Set-Cookie: _csess=5j1li5c0ncaqi5n9l9thl36sb6; path=/; secure; HttpOnly Set-Cookie: hl=fr; expires=Mon, 23-Dec-2024 01:39:30 GMT; Max-Age=31536000; path=/ Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=15768000; includeSubDomains; preload X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Frame-Options: DENY X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block Redirecting to /fr/ Redirecting to /fr/.

info.name: XSS-Protection Header - Cross-Site Scripting
author: joshlarsen
info.description: Setting the XSS-Protection header is deprecated. Setting the header to anything other than `0` can actually introduce an XSS vulnerability.

# www.robotstxt.org/
# www.google.com/support/webmasters/bin/answer.py?hl=en&answer=156449

Disallow: /fr/reservation/*/prix
Disallow: /en/booking/*/price

Disallow: /en/currency/*/switch

Disallow: /fr/geocoding/*/*
Disallow: /en/geocoding/*/*
Disallow: /en/listing/%url%
Disallow: /fr/annonce/%url%
#Sitemap: https://cocorico.local/sitemap.xml

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: reflexqvt.anact.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response: HTTP/1.1 302 Found Connection: close Transfer-Encoding: chunked Cache-Control: no-cache, private Content-Security-Policy: default-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; img-src * data:; Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8 Date: Sun, 24 Dec 2023 01:42:23 GMT Feature-Policy: midi 'none'; Location: /fr/ Referrer-Policy: origin-when-cross-origin Server: nginx Set-Cookie: _csess=flbd1djitu5a2iuk1pva31m7jj; path=/; secure; HttpOnly Set-Cookie: hl=fr; expires=Mon, 23-Dec-2024 01:42:23 GMT; Max-Age=31536000; path=/ Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=15768000; includeSubDomains; preload X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Frame-Options: DENY X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block Redirecting to /fr/ Redirecting to /fr/.
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: reflexqvt.anact.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://reflexqvt.anact.fr/'

info.name: Detect SSL Certificate Issuer
author: lingtren
info.description: Extract the issuer's organization from the target's certificate. Issuers are entities which sign and distribute certificates.

info.name: SSL DNS Names
author: pdteam
info.description: Extract the Subject Alternative Name (SAN) from the target's certificate. SAN facilitates the usage of additional hostnames with the same certificate.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.

info.name: Weak Cipher Suites Detection
author: pussycat0x
info.description: A weak cipher is defined as an encryption/decryption algorithm that uses a key of insufficient length. Using an insufficient length for a key in an encryption/decryption algorithm opens up the possibility (or probability) that the encryption scheme could be broken.

info.name: Deprecated TLS Detection (TLS 1.1 or SSLv3)
author: righettod
forgedhallpass
info.description: Both TLS 1.1 and SSLv3 are deprecated in favor of stronger encryption.
info.remediation: Update the web server's TLS configuration to disable TLS 1.1 and SSLv3.
